name: (No style)
negative_prompt: longbody, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality

name: Shonen
prompt: shonen {prompt} . action-packed, heroic, dynamic, youthful, energetic, vibrant, battle scenes, dramatic poses

name: Shojo
prompt: shojo {prompt} . romantic, soft, pastel colors, delicate, emotional, beautiful, elegant, flowery, cute characters

name: Seinen
prompt: seinen {prompt} . mature, gritty, realistic, detailed, complex, dark themes, urban, dramatic lighting, intricate backgrounds

name: Josei
prompt: josei {prompt} . mature, emotional, romantic, soft, realistic, detailed, elegant, sophisticated, subtle

name: Isekai
prompt: isekai {prompt} . fantasy, otherworldly, magical, vibrant, adventure, mystical creatures, epic, dramatic, detailed

name: Mecha
prompt: mecha {prompt} . robots, futuristic, technological, dynamic, battle scenes, detailed machinery, dramatic, action-packed

name: Slice of Life
prompt: slice of life {prompt} . everyday scenes, peaceful, calming, realistic, detailed, light-hearted, simple, serene, cozy

name: Fantasy
prompt: fantasy {prompt} . magical, vibrant, mystical, detailed, otherworldly, epic, adventure, heroic, enchanting

name: Cyberpunk
prompt: cyberpunk {prompt} . futuristic, neon lights, dystopian, gritty, high-tech, cityscape, dark, cybernetics, urban, vibrant
negative_prompt: natural, soft, pastoral, historic, rustic, organic

name: Steampunk
prompt: steampunk {prompt} . victorian, industrial, gears, steam-powered, brass, ornate, alternate history, mechanical, adventurous, intricate
